title: The Spoiled Children Edition
description:
On this week’s episode, Felix, Emily and Anna discuss why you might be missing the point when talking about Operation Varsity Blues, argue about the Deutsche Bank/Commerzbank merger and talk about the growing concern around Boeing planes. 
In the Slate Plus segment: Remembering Alan Krueger. Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas,@EmilyRPeck, 
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
